titleStmt.title: To the praise of Mrs. Cellier the Popish midwife: on her incomparable book.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Walter Davis in Amen-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "The brightest glory of your sex, and age, (sage,".
The word "(sage," from the second line of verse, is printed with the first line of verse.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
